message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
You were too generous in round 1, I'm going to try to take more this time.
You wanted more, now it's your turn to make a tough choice!
You're not getting any more generous, I'll try to take it all!
You're getting greedy, Bob. Don't expect me to give up everything!
You're not giving up, neither am I. Last chance to make a deal.
You're not getting it all, Bob. I'm not going down without a fight.
I'm not backing down. You're running out of time and money.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not going to give up yet.
You're almost out of time, Alice. I'm taking what I can get.
You're taking advantage of my desperation, Bob. I'm not going down without a fight.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
